ygData.subject: 5 books!?! Where are 3 & 4?!
ygData.msgSnippet: Pardon my late arrival on the scene of this mailing list but I am curious if someone can confirm the whereabouts of the 3rd and 4th books refered to in some
ygData.messageBody:
Pardon my late arrival on the scene of this mailing list but I am curious
if someone can confirm the whereabouts of the 3rd and 4th books refered to
in some earlier posts. I have been out of EQ until recently when someone
brought to my attention that there were additions made to Tinkering. I
stepped back in and have been at it for some 3 weeks now.. but can't find
any new books put into the game on Tinkering. I would LOVE someone's help
with books 3&4, or just a new list of items and components required.

-Jeremy Tully
jtully@...
http://www.swbell.net/theros/
